thread.title: Hormel reinstates turkey plant workers as flu worries subside
thread.title_full: Hormel reinstates turkey plant workers as flu worries subside

author: Karlee Weinmann
title: Hormel reinstates turkey plant workers as flu worries subside
text:
Apartment Sales Tracker Home / News / Business & Economy / Hormel reinstates turkey plant workers as flu worries subside Hormel is bringing back laid off workers to its Faribault turkey plant after an outbreak of avian flu killed more than 9 million commercial and domestic birds across Minnesota. (Bloomberg file photo) Hormel reinstates turkey plant workers as flu worries subside By: Karlee Weinmann August 25, 2015 2:55 pm 0 The company is gradually bringing its Faribault turkey-processing facility back to full capacity.
